results.title: Amlodipine synergizes with temozolomide against glioma stem cells by modulating MGMT expression through downregulation of the AKT/GSK3beta/beta-catenin axis.
results.text_hl: Additionally, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ enhanced the @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ of @CHEMICAL_Temozolomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077204 @@@TMZ@@@ against GSCs by downregulating @GENE_MGMT @GENE_17314 @@@MGMT@@@ expression through the suppression of the @GENE_AKT1 @GENE_11651 @@@Akt@@@/@GENE_GSK3B @GENE_56637 @@@GSK3beta@@@/@GENE_CTNNB1 @GENE_12387 @@@beta-catenin@@@ axis.

results.title: Cancer Stem Cells of Hepatocellular Carcinoma Are Suppressed by the Voltage-gated Calcium Channel Inhibitor Amlodipine.
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ of the @GENE_CACNG4 @GENE_27092 @@@CACNG4@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was higher at lower concentrations in CSCs than in non-CSCs, and markedly decreased the number of tumorspheres.

Cancer Stem Cells of Hepatocellular Carcinoma Are Suppressed by the Voltage-gated Calcium Channel Inhibitor Amlodipine. Anticancer Res. 2023 Nov;43(11):4855-4864. PMID: 37909988

results.title: Side Effects of Antihypertensives Induced by Switching to Different Generic Medications: Case Reports.
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@adverse drug reactions@@@ in both @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were more likely to be side effects of the medications after switching to different generic antihypertensives produced by different companies (@SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ 1: @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ 2: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@).

results.title: [Identification of ion channel/transporter expression profiles in digestive cancer stem cells for novel targeting therapy].
results.text_hl: The @GENE_TRPV2 @GENE_51393 @@@TRPV2@@@ inhibitor @CHEMICAL_tranilast @CHEMICAL_MESH:C012293 @@@tranilast@@@, VGCCs inhibitors @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@, and VGKC inhibitor @CHEMICAL_4_Aminopyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015761 @@@4-aminopyridine@@@ exhibited greater @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ in CSCs compared with non-CSCs, and their inhibitory effects were also confirmed in a xenograft model in nude mice.

results.title: [Multicenter community-based trial of amlodipine in hypertension in Israel].
results.text_hl: The most common @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AML@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@AE@@@ requiring cessation of the drug was @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@ in 2.6% of the 266 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@; in 3.7% it persisted during therapy.

citations.NLM: Yosefy C, Viskoper JR, Leshem Y, Rav-Hon Y, Rosenberg GI, Yaskil E. [Multicenter community-based trial of amlodipine in hypertension in Israel]. Harefuah. 1999 Aug;137(3-4):89-93, 176. PMID: 10959290

results.title: [Pharmacogenetic approaches to predicting the efficiency and safety of amlodipine in patients with arterial hypertension].
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (I-@DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@ stage) with the TT genotype of the @VARIANT_c.3435C>T_ABCB1_human @VARIANT_tmVar:c|SUB|C|3435|T;HGVS:c.3435C>T;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:5243;RS#:1045642;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:4327768 @@@C3435T@@@ gene polymorphism one can expect higher rates of antihypertensive efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in combination with a good safety profile and the lowest @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@ADR@@@ percentage, while @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with the CC genotype more likely to develop @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@ADR@@@ and lower antihypertensive responsiveness.

citations.NLM: Sychev DA, Shih NV, Kalle EG, Ryzhikova KA, Morozova TE. [Pharmacogenetic approaches to predicting the efficiency and safety of amlodipine in patients with arterial hypertension]. Biomed Khim. 2017 Oct;63(5):432-439. PMID: 29080877

results.title: A novel stealth liposomal topotecan with amlodipine: apoptotic effect is associated with deletion of intracellular Ca2+ by amlodipine thus leading to an enhanced antitumor activity in leukemia.
results.text_hl: In three @DISEASE_Leukemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007938 @@@leukemias@@@, @CELLLINE_CVCL:0004 @@@K562@@@, @CELLLINE_CVCL:0002 @@@HL-60@@@, and multidrug resistant (MDR) @CELLLINE_CVCL:0002 @@@HL-60@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ of @CHEMICAL_Topotecan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019772 @@@topotecan@@@ was potentiated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, while @CHEMICAL_Topotecan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019772 @@@topotecan@@@ alone was resistant to MDR @CELLLINE_CVCL:0002 @@@HL-60@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Li X, Ruan GR, Lu WL, Hong HY, Liang GW, Zhang YT, Liu Y, Long C, Ma X, Yuan L, Wang JC, Zhang X, Zhang Q.
